channel.title: Swimming on Nikhil Thota
channel.description: Recent content in Swimming on Nikhil Thota

item.title: Aquatic Confessions
item.description: This was originally posted on my newsletter. I have a… confession to make. I’m an adult that doesn’t know how to swim. I spent the majority of my childhood in one of America’s wettest states: Florida. As is tradition in the swamp, my parents put me in swim lessons. Though, my 8-year-old self decided that he preferred video games on land and my parents didn’t fight it, not knowing how to swim themselves.
